003
004package kut;
005
006import java.util.function.Function;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008
009/** Tupla de tres elementos */
010public class Tp3<T, U, V> {
011  /** Elemento 1 */
012  public final T e1;
013  /** Elemento 2 */
014  public final U e2;
015  /** Elemento 3 */
016  public final V e3;
017
018  /**
019   * Constructor.
020   * @param e1 Elemento 1.
021   * @param e2 Elemento 2.
022   * @param e3 Elemento 3.
023   */
024  public Tp3 (T e1, U e2, V e3) {
025    this.e1 = e1;
026    this.e2 = e2;
027    this.e3 = e3;
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  public String toString () {
032    return "Tp(" + e1.toString() + ", " + e2.toString() +
033      ", " + e3.toString() + ")";
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Returns Tp3 'JSONized' in 'js'.
038   * @param <T> Type of Tp3 element 1.
039   * @param <U> Type of Tp3 element 2.
040   * @param <V> Type of Tp3 element 3.
041   * @param js Tp3 'JSONized'.
042   * @param eFromJs1 Function to restore the element 1 of the Tp3 'JSONized' in 'js'.
043   * @param eFromJs2 Function to restore the element 2 of the Tp3 'JSONized' in 'js'.
044   * @param eFromJs3 Function to restore the element 3 of the Tp3 'JSONized' in 'js'.
045   * @return Tp3 'JSONized" in 'js'.
046   */
047  public static <T, U, V> Tp3<T, U, V> fromJs (
048    String js,
049    Function<String, T> eFromJs1,
050    Function<String, U> eFromJs2,
051    Function<String, V> eFromJs3
052  ) {
053    ArrayList<String> a = Js.ra(js);
054    if (a.size() != 3) {
055      js = js.length() <= 50 ? js : js.substring(47) + "...";
056      throw new IllegalArgumentException(
057      "  \n'" + js + "' is not a valid Tp JSONization." +
058      "  \n Tp JSONization type is \"[JS-element1,JS-element2,JS-element3]\""
059      );
060    }
061    return new Tp3<>(
062      eFromJs1.apply(a.get(0)),
063      eFromJs2.apply(a.get(1)),
064      eFromJs3.apply(a.get(2))
065    );
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Returns JSON representation of 'tp' ("[JS-element2,JS-element2,JS-element3]").
070   * @param <T> Type of 'tp' element1.
071   * @param <U> Type of 'tp' elemen2.
072   * @param <V> Type of 'tp' elemen3.
073   * @param tp Tp3.
074   * @param eToJs1 Function to 'JSONize' the element 1 of 'tp'.
075   * @param eToJs2 Function to 'JSONize' the element 2 of 'tp'.
076   * @param eToJs3 Function to 'JSONize' the element 2 of 'tp'.
077   * @return JSON representation of 'tp'.
078   */
079  public static <T, U, V> String toJs (
080    Tp3<T, U, V> tp,
081    Function<T, String> eToJs1,
082    Function<U, String> eToJs2,
083    Function<V, String> eToJs3
084  ) {
085    return Js.w(Arr.mk(
086      eToJs1.apply(tp.e1),
087      eToJs2.apply(tp.e2),
088      eToJs3.apply(tp.e3)
089    ));
090  }
091
092}
